author: grisha
msg: Changed the page to reflect links to mod_python 3.0.3.

author: madhum
msg: OpenSSL should be included as "openssl/ssl.h" and not "ssl.h" (and rely on the
INCLUDE path to be defined properly)

author: bnicholes
msg: Added documentation for the directives SecureListen and NWSSLTrustedCerts
that are provided through mod_nw_ssl for NetWare

author: bnicholes
msg: Added the optional ssl_enable functions to allow mod_proxy to hook into
mod_nw_ssl on NetWare.  This allows a unsecure connection to be upgraded
to a secure connection when required by mod_proxy.  Also added the
directive NWSSLTrustedCerts to allow an administrator to provide a list of
certificates used to upgrade the secure connections.

author: bnicholes
msg: Added a note that indicates that forward slashes should always be used on
non-unix systems even if the OS allows backslashes
